current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the specific exemption for professional
			 football leagues and to provide a special rule for other professional
			 sports leagues, and to provide an additional authorization of
			 appropriations for the Family Violence Prevention and Services Act.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Securing Assistance for Victims’ Empowerment (SAVE) Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Securing Assistance for Victims’ Empowerment (SAVE) Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Elimination of specific exemption for professional football leagues; special rules relating to
			 professional sports leagues

external-xref.#tail: of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986

header.#text: Elimination of specific exemption for professional football leagues

quote.#text:
, or professional football leagues (whether or not administering a pension fund for football
			 players)

external-xref.#tail: of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986

header.#text: Special rules relating to professional sports leagues

text.#text: by redesignating subsection (s) as subsection (t), and
by inserting after subsection (r) the following new subsection:

No organization or entity shall be treated as described in subsection (c)(6) if such organization
			 or entity—

header.#text: Special Rules Relating to Professional Sports Leagues

text.#text:
is a professional sports league, organization, or association, a substantial activity of which is
			 to foster national or international professional sports competitions
			 (including by managing league business affairs, officiating or providing
			 referees, coordinating schedules, managing sponsorships or broadcast
			 sales, operating loan programs for competition facilities, or overseeing
			 player conduct), and
has annual gross receipts in excess of $10,000,000.
The amendments made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2014.

header.#text: Family violence prevention and services act

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Securing Assistance for Victims’ Empowerment (SAVE) Act/s:2

text.#text:
The purpose of this section is to authorize, for providing shelter, supportive services, or
			 prevention services to victims of family violence, domestic violence, or
			 dating violence, an amount equal to the savings obtained by the amendments
			 made under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 303(a) of the Family Violence Prevention and Services Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Family Violence Prevention and Services Act/s:303/ss:a

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S2816 IS: Securing Assistance for Victims’ Empowerment (SAVE) Act
